name: One Shot Gladiator
description:
One Shot Gladiator

a game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2019 with the theme "Only One" over the course of 48h.

Top down arena shooter. You can pick up different weapons but only use them onces. So plan ahead.

How many waves can you survive?

How to Play

For best performance download the game (Windows only).

Click on the Tutorial button in game.

Mouse and Keyboard as well as Gamepad support. Changeable in the pause menu.
